Detailed Description

This class defines parallelogram.

Internal is this parallelogram represents as 2D linear transformation (i2d::ITransformation2d), but it is interpreted as a geometrical shape which is done, if you transform unity quadrant [0, 1]X[0, 1] using this transformation.

) const [virtual]

Calulate inverse transformation of the object into second one.

Parameters:
modecontrols needed transformation exactness.
errorFactorPtroptional output where approximated length of transformation error vector will be stored. Value 0 means that transformation is exactly done.
resultresult object.
Returns:
true, if transformation was done correctly.
